name: vDSP.DiscreteFourierTransform
desc: An object that provides forward and inverse discrete Fourier transforms on single- or double-precision collections of interleaved or split-complex data.

items.name: init(previous: vDSP.DiscreteFourierTransform<Float>?, count: Int, direction: vDSP.FourierTransformDirection, transformType: vDSP.DFTTransformType, ofType: T.Type)
items.desc: Returns a new discrete Fourier transform instance.

items.name: func transform<U>(real: U, imaginary: U) -> (real: [Float], imaginary: [Float])
items.desc: Returns the result of a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U>(real: U, imaginary: U) -> (real: [Double], imaginary: [Double])
items.desc: Returns the result of a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U, V>(inputReal: U, inputImaginary: U, outputReal: inout V, outputImaginary: inout V)
items.desc: Computes a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U, V>(inputReal: U, inputImaginary: U, outputReal: inout V, outputImaginary: inout V)
items.desc: Computes a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U>(input: U) -> [DSPComplex]
items.desc: Returns the result of a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U>(input: U) -> [DSPDoubleComplex]
items.desc: Returns the result of a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U, V>(input: U, output: inout V)
items.desc: Computes a single-precision discrete Fourier transform.

items.name: func transform<U, V>(input: U, output: inout V)
items.desc: Computes a double-precision discrete Fourier transform.
